005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.impl.DefaultContainerModelAssemblySupport;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.CollectionUtil;
010
011import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
012import java.util.LinkedList;
013import java.util.List;
014import java.util.Map;
015
016import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
017
018/**
019 * An assembly model builder.
020 *
021 * @param <MI>
022 *          the model instance Java type
023 * @param <NMI>
024 *          the named model instance Java type
025 * @param <FI>
026 *          the field instance Java type
027 * @param <AI>
028 *          the assembly instance Java type
029 * @param <CI>
030 *          the choice instance Java type
031 * @param <CGI>
032 *          the choice group instance Java type
033 * @see DefaultChoiceGroupModelBuilder for a choice group model builder
034 * @see DefaultChoiceModelBuilder for a choice model builder
035 */
036@SuppressWarnings("PMD.UseConcurrentHashMap")
037public class DefaultAssemblyModelBuilder<
038    MI extends IModelInstance,
039    NMI extends INamedModelInstance,
040    FI extends IFieldInstance,
041    AI extends IAssemblyInstance,
042    CI extends IChoiceInstance,
043    CGI extends IChoiceGroupInstance>
044    extends DefaultChoiceModelBuilder<MI, NMI, FI, AI> {
045  // collections to store model instances
046  @NonNull
047  private final List<CI> choiceInstances = new LinkedList<>();
048  @NonNull
049  private final Map<String, CGI> choiceGroupInstances = new LinkedHashMap<>();
050
051  /**
052   * Append the instance.
053   *
054   * @param instance
055   *          the instance to append
056   */
057  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
058  public void append(@NonNull CI instance) {
059    getModelInstances().add((MI) instance);
060    choiceInstances.add(instance);
061  }
062
063  /**
064   * Append the instance.
065   *
066   * @param instance
067   *          the instance to append
068   */
069  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
070  public void append(@NonNull CGI instance) {
071    getModelInstances().add((MI) instance);
072    choiceGroupInstances.put(instance.getGroupAsName(), instance);
073  }
074
075  /**
076   * Get the appended choice instances.
077   *
078   * @return the instances or an empty list if no instances were appended
079   */
080  @NonNull
081  protected List<CI> getChoiceInstances() {
082    return choiceInstances;
083  }
084
085  /**
086   * Get the appended choice group instances.
087   *
088   * @return the instances or an empty map if no instances were appended
089   */
090  @NonNull
091  protected Map<String, CGI> getChoiceGroupInstances() {
092    return choiceGroupInstances;
093  }
094
095  /**
096   * Build an immutable assembly model container based on the appended instances.
097   *
098   * @return the container
099   */
100  @NonNull
101  public IContainerModelAssemblySupport<MI, NMI, FI, AI, CI, CGI> buildAssembly() {
102    return getModelInstances().isEmpty()
103        ? IContainerModelAssemblySupport.empty()
104        : new DefaultContainerModelAssemblySupport<>(
105            CollectionUtil.unmodifiableList(getModelInstances()),
106            CollectionUtil.unmodifiableMap(getNamedModelInstances()),
107            CollectionUtil.unmodifiableMap(getFieldInstances()),
108            CollectionUtil.unmodifiableMap(getAssemblyInstances()),
109            CollectionUtil.unmodifiableList(getChoiceInstances()),
110            CollectionUtil.unmodifiableMap(getChoiceGroupInstances()));
111  }
112}
